titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Fruitland Canning Association Prospectus 1970
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Cheryl Gunselman.

publicationstmt.publisher: Washington State University Libraries Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Doug Lambeth. 2012
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid written in English. English.

repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections

did.abstract: This collection consists of a single document, a 1970 prospectus including financial data, organizational, facilities, and equipment information.

bioghist.p: Fruitland Canning Association was incorporated in the State of Idaho in 1937. It was a cooperative of fruit and vegetable growers, and as of 1970 it was affiliated with North Pacific Canners and Packers, processing both frozen and canned products.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single document, a 1970 prospectus including financial data, organizational, facilities, and equipment information.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This collection consists of a single document, a 1970 prospectus including financial data, organizational, facilities, and equipment information.

processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Cheryl Gunselman.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
